answers.answer: I checkfive times a day. In the morning,  after very meal, and before bed. I controle it with diet.

I had it and was required to check 4 times a day: first thing in the morning and after each meal (not snacks). I kept it under control by diet (watching sweets, starches, and fried foods) also portion control is very important.
I have to check it 4 times a day, my lower is 80 send my highest, that was once, 192

question: For all u moms who have gestational diabetes,What has been your lowest blood sugar and your highest?  How often do u check and how are u maintaining it?
